content:
• Thursday, September 8, 2011
  • TMH

    Hospital staffing provider Team Health Holdings (NYSE:TMH) acquires privately-held Anesthesia...

    Hospital staffing provider Team Health Holdings (NYSE:TMH) acquires privately-held Anesthesia Services, an outsourced anesthesiology physician management practice based in Colorado. Shares +1.7% AH.

     
     
     
     
    | 6:48 PM
  • PVH

    Following right on the heels of its recently completed 5M share repurchase, Warnaco (WRC)...

    Following right on the heels of its recently completed 5M share repurchase, Warnaco (WRC) announces an all-new $200M stock buyback. Shares +1.1% AH.

     
     
     
     
    | 6:42 PM
  • XPER

    Tessera Technologies (TSRA) guides Q3 estimates lower due to higher-than-anticipated legal...

    Tessera Technologies (TSRA) guides Q3 estimates lower due to higher-than-anticipated legal expenses related to its patent litigation. It now expects revenue to be about $60M, below analysts' consensus of $74M. Shares -4.2% AH.

     
     
     
     
    | 6:07 PM
  • ULTA

    Ulta Salon (NASDAQ:ULTA) Q2 earnings easily beat estimates on an 83% Y/Y jump in revenue. Net...

    Ulta Salon (NASDAQ:ULTA) Q2 earnings easily beat estimates on an 83% Y/Y jump in revenue. Net sales were up 23%, boosted by solid same-store sales numbers. The company also ups Q3 guidance, now expecting revenues of between $400M and $407M, well above Street expectations of $396M. Shares +2.1% AH.

     
     
     
     
    | 5:56 PM
  • DNDN

    Dendreon (NASDAQ:DNDN) announces a restructuring including a reduction of ~500 jobs, and the...

    Dendreon (NASDAQ:DNDN) announces a restructuring including a reduction of ~500 jobs, and the departure of COO Hans Bishop. The company is looking to trim expenses in light of diminished sales expectations for its high-priced Provenge prostate cancer vaccine. Shares +4.6% AH.

     
     
     
     
    | 5:49 PM
  • VRNT

    Verint Systems (VRNT +2.6%), a maker of voice and video analysis products for the security and...

    Verint Systems (VRNT +2.6%), a maker of voice and video analysis products for the security and business intelligence markets, finished higher after reporting FQ2 results. Though EPS of $0.57 missed consensus by $0.03, revenue of $195.7M beat by $4.6M, and the company raised its FY12 revenue growth guidance to 9% from 8%.

     
     
     
     
    | 5:03 PM
  • BB

    RBC's Mike Abramsky thinks Research In Motion's (RIMM) FQ2 results and FQ3 guidance will beat...

    RBC's Mike Abramsky thinks Research In Motion's (RIMM) FQ2 results and FQ3 guidance will beat Street estimates when the company reports later this month, thanks to its latest BlackBerrys driving upgrades. However, Abramsky still rates RIM a Neutral, believing its QNX phones "may remain pivotal" to reversing North American share declines. (previously)

     
     
     
     
    | 4:40 PM
  • PPP

    Primero Mining (NYSE:PPP), which plunged in August after Northgate Minerals (NXG) cancelled its...

    Primero Mining (NYSE:PPP), which plunged in August after Northgate Minerals (NXG) cancelled its acquisition plans, lost another 13.6% today after revising its 2011 operating outlook. Due to a mill workers strike and lower-than-expected gold purity, the company is lowering its forecasts for gold production and silver spot sales.

     
     
     
     
    | 4:22 PM
  • VRSN

    VeriSign (NASDAQ:VRSN) sinks, -9% AH, as CFO Brian Robins resigns to "pursue new opportunities."...

    VeriSign (NASDAQ:VRSN) sinks, -9% AH, as CFO Brian Robins resigns to "pursue new opportunities." Shares have been on a coaster ride lately amid takeover rumors.
     
     
     
     
    | 4:19 PM
  • AABA

    The Yahoo (YHOO +6.2%) soap opera, kicked into overdrive with Carol Bartz's Tuesday firing,...

    The Yahoo (YHOO +6.2%) soap opera, kicked into overdrive with Carol Bartz's Tuesday firing, continues to take some eye-opening twists (I, II, III). A source tells Nicholas Carlson that Jerry Yang wants to take the company private, and is feuding with Chairman Roy Bostock. Yang owns 3.6% of Yahoo, while fellow co-founder David Filo owns 5.8%.

     
     
     
     
    | 4:09 PM
  • NCR

    NCR (NCR +1.7%) holds up into the closing bell after JP Morgan raised the shares to overweight...

    NCR (NCR +1.7%) holds up into the closing bell after JP Morgan raised the shares to overweight today, saying the company is trading at 2007-08 multiples and a discount to its peer group.
     
     
     
     
    | 3:59 PM
  • CHK

    In the wake of recent deals involving the Utica shale play, SunTrust says Chesapeake Energy (CHK...

    In the wake of recent deals involving the Utica shale play, SunTrust says Chesapeake Energy (CHK +1.7%) could be sitting on billions - "by far the largest Utica acreage position [and] in the best part of the play." It could be worth more than $26/share, the firm says, noting its $46 price target incorporates a conservative Utica valuation.

     
     
     
     
    | 3:53 PM
  • BIOL

    Biolase Technology (BLTI +3%) holds on to gains late in the day after saying it's been issued a...

    Biolase Technology (BLTI +3%) holds on to gains late in the day after saying it's been issued a new patent covering the use of laser technology for treating various conditions of the eye.

     
     
     
     
    | 3:51 PM
  • NVAX

    Novavax (NVAX +2.8%) gains after an article published in the Journal of Virology says results...

    Novavax (NVAX +2.8%) gains after an article published in the Journal of Virology says results from a Phase I/II clinical study of the company's H5N1 influenza vaccine candidate conducted in 2008 were largely successful.

     
     
     
     
    | 3:41 PM
  • JKS

    Ever-volatile solar stocks are among the day's biggest losers. JKS -8.5%. TSL -6.1%. STP -5.6%....

    Ever-volatile solar stocks are among the day's biggest losers. JKS -8.5%. TSL -6.1%. STP -5.6%. SPWRA -6.7%. JASO -5.9%. FSLR -3.7%. LDK -4.3%.
     
     
     
     
    | 3:35 PM
  • MTRX

    Matrix Service (MTRX -12.1%) FQ4 earnings beat on sharply improved margins and a jump in revenue...

    Matrix Service (MTRX -12.1%) FQ4 earnings beat on sharply improved margins and a jump in revenue from its repair-and-maintenance services business. However, the stock is getting slammed after the company cut its FY estimates.

     
     
     
     
    | 3:15 PM
  • MIND

    Mitcham Industries (MIND -10%) FQ2 beat top-line estimates on a 40% Y/Y jump in...

    Mitcham Industries (MIND -10%) FQ2 beat top-line estimates on a 40% Y/Y jump in equipment-leasing revenue. However, the stock is getting hammered as its EPS fell short of expectations, adversely impacted by dilution from its 2.3M share secondary offering earlier this year.

     
     
     
     
    | 3:02 PM
  • VLO

    Valero Energy (VLO +4.7%) remains atop the S&P leader board, with Oppenheimer seeing a...

    Valero Energy (VLO +4.7%) remains atop the S&P leader board, with Oppenheimer seeing a potential 60% upside in the stock as the company integrates new refineries it recently acquired. Earlier, VLO said it plans to boost Eagle Ford crude delivered to its refineries by 30%, and it doesn't rule out buying Sunoco's (SUN -4.4%) Pennsylvania refineries.
     
     
     
     
    | 2:43 PM
  • MCPIQ

    Rare-earth miner Molycorp (MCP +2.5%) is trading higher today on speculation that it may be...

    Rare-earth miner Molycorp (MCP +2.5%) is trading higher today on speculation that it may be added to the S&P 500.
     
     
     
     
    | 2:42 PM | 2 Comments
  • TNGO

    Tangoe (OTC:TNGO), a developer of cloud-based software for managing a company's communications...

    Tangoe (OTC:TNGO), a developer of cloud-based software for managing a company's communications devices and assets , is up 18.1% on above-average volume. Shares had barely moved on Tuesday, when three of its IPO underwriters initiated coverage with bullish ratings.
     
     
     
     
    | 2:42 PM
  • DECK

    Deckers (DECK +1.4%), Wolverine World Wide (WWW +1.3%), and V.F. Corp. (VFC +1.1%) are gaining...

    Deckers (DECK +1.4%), Wolverine World Wide (WWW +1.3%), and V.F. Corp. (VFC +1.1%) are gaining after Credit Suisse starts coverage on the apparel companies at Outperform. The firm believes consensus estimates for Deckers are conservative, and it's a fan of Wolverine's "breadth of product lines and geographic reach."

     
     
     
     
    | 2:29 PM
  • KWK

    Quicksilver Resources (KWK -9.2%) gets hammered after UBS cuts the shares to neutral on a...

    Quicksilver Resources (KWK -9.2%) gets hammered after UBS cuts the shares to neutral on a reduced long-term natural gas price outlook and concerns over the company's operating costs.

     
     
     
     
    | 2:28 PM
  • SWY

    Safeway (SWY +1.6%) gets a boost from a Morgan Stanley upgrade to equalweight on valuation....

    Safeway (SWY +1.6%) gets a boost from a Morgan Stanley upgrade to equalweight on valuation. Morgan says the shares are trading near 2008/09 valuation lows, and rising food inflation risks are already priced in.

     
     
     
     
    | 2:19 PM
  • YNDX

    Russian search provider Yandex (NASDAQ:YNDX), which went public in May, is up 3% after The...

    Russian search provider Yandex (NASDAQ:YNDX), which went public in May, is up 3% after The Moscow Times reports the company plans to monetize its Yandex.Music service by serving multimedia ads, and sharing the revenue with copyright owners.

     
     
     
     
    | 2:15 PM
  • RPTP

    Raptor Pharmaceutical (RPTP -3.7%) is trading down after pricing its secondary offering of 10M...

    Raptor Pharmaceutical (RPTP -3.7%) is trading down after pricing its secondary offering of 10M shares at $4, a 7% discount to yesterdays's close. The company plans to use the funds to bring its new drug candidates to market.

     
     
     
     
    | 2:09 PM
  • NCR

    NCR is up 1.9% after J.P. Morgan's Paul Coster upgrades the maker of ATM systems and checkout...

    NCR is up 1.9% after J.P. Morgan's Paul Coster upgrades the maker of ATM systems and checkout terminals to Overweight. Coster expects NCR's margins to expand in 2013, thanks in part to its recent acquisition of Radiant, and likes the company's focus on industry-wide solutions, software innovation, and growth markets.
     
     
     
     
    | 2:09 PM
  • REGN

    Regeneron Pharmaceuticals (REGN +2.8%) is up today after BMO initiates it with an outperform,...

    Regeneron Pharmaceuticals (REGN +2.8%) is up today after BMO initiates it with an outperform, saying it has a "best-in-class antibody platform, deep biologic product pipeline and multiple approved large molecule drugs."

     
     
     
     
    | 1:59 PM
  • SFD

    Smithfield Foods' (SFD -4.34%) trades lower as FQ1 earnings jumped +7.6% Y/Y on higher pork...

    Smithfield Foods' (SFD -4.34%) trades lower as FQ1 earnings jumped +7.6% Y/Y on higher pork prices and strong export demand from China, but revenue fell short of estimates due to higher feed costs.

     
     
     
     
    | 1:50 PM | 1 Comment
  • GILD

    Pharmasset (OTCPK:VRUS +4%) shares are on the move after favorable analyst notes: Piper Jaffray...

    Pharmasset (OTCPK:VRUS +4%) shares are on the move after favorable analyst notes: Piper Jaffray initiates coverage at Overweight, and Brean Murray raises its price target to $105 from $87. On top of that, Briefing.com reports hearing that a firm has issued positive comments regarding the company's potential valuation in an M&A scenario.

     
     
     
     
    | 1:35 PM
  • HES

    Hess (HES +2.7%) trades up after announcing earlier that it was acquiring privately held...

    Hess (HES +2.7%) trades up after announcing earlier that it was acquiring privately held Marquette Exploration, plus other leases in Ohio's Utica Shale for around $750M. The purchases will expand its stake in the region by an additional 85K acres.

     
     
     
     
    | 1:13 PM
  • DECK

    Deckers Outdoor (DECK +2.5%) gets a pop as Credit Suisse initiates it with an outperform, saying...

    Deckers Outdoor (DECK +2.5%) gets a pop as Credit Suisse initiates it with an outperform, saying there are nuggets of revenue and earnings growth opportunity lying within the margins.
     
     
     
     
    | 1:00 PM
  • AABA

    Yahoo (YHOO +3.4%) jumps after Dan Loeb's Third Point Fund discloses a 5.1% stake in the company...

    Yahoo (YHOO +3.4%) jumps after Dan Loeb's Third Point Fund discloses a 5.1% stake in the company along with a letter to the Board demanding major changes to both the BOD and Management. "(Yahoo) has been severely damaged - but not irreparably - by poor management and governance."
     
     
     
     
    | 12:44 PM
  • OPEN

    The bleeding just gets worse for shares of OpenTable (OPEN -9.5%) after analysts bandied around...

    The bleeding just gets worse for shares of OpenTable (OPEN -9.5%) after analysts bandied around words like "crushes" and "devastating" to describe the effect of the Google (GOOG +1.1%)-Zagat deal on the company.
     
     
     
     
    | 12:38 PM | 2 Comments
  • STEI

    Funeral service provider Stewart Enterprises (STEI -3%) trades lower after its FQ3 earnings...

    Funeral service provider Stewart Enterprises (STEI -3%) trades lower after its FQ3 earnings misses estimates late yesterday, despite a near doubling of Y/Y profit from a multimillion-dollar legal settlement. Reduced demand for burial items and services due to an increase in cremation is blamed for the miss.

     
     
     
     
    | 12:32 PM
  • ANDV

    Tesoro (TSO +2.3%) says yesterday's purchase from Supervalu (SVU +0.3%) will increase its...

    Tesoro (TSO +2.3%) says yesterday's purchase from Supervalu (SVU +0.3%) will increase its network of retail stations by 25%, and strengthen its refining and marketing integration by over 12%.
     
     
     
     
    | 12:18 PM
  • JNPR

    Auriga's Sandeep Shyamsukha may think Juniper (JNPR +1.4%) will cede market share to Cisco (CSCO...

    Auriga's Sandeep Shyamsukha may think Juniper (JNPR +1.4%) will cede market share to Cisco (CSCO +1.7%), but he's still upgrading the former company to Buy in tandem with the latter. Shyamsukha, who wisely downgraded Juniper in May, is positive on the company's valuation, and its QFabric, PTX, and MobileNext products.

     
     
     
     
    | 12:03 PM | 1 Comment
  • UNFI

    United Natural Foods (UNFI -1%) dips this morning as FQ4 earnings were largely in line with...

    United Natural Foods (UNFI -1%) dips this morning as FQ4 earnings were largely in line with estimates, but profits slipped 2.6% Y/Y on charges related to the sale of some of its non-food related businesses. The company also issues a cautious forecast for FY12.

     
     
     
     
    | 11:47 AM
  • VLO

    Valero Energy (VLO +5.5%) is higher this morning after saying it plans to boost the amount of...

    Valero Energy (VLO +5.5%) is higher this morning after saying it plans to boost the amount of Eagle Ford crude oil delivered to two of its Texas refineries by 30% over the next few quarters, underscoring the increased productivity of the south Texas oil field.

     
     
     
     
    | 11:35 AM
  • ZUMZ

    Zumiez (ZUMZ +2.5%) trades higher this morning after Credit Suisse initiates the shares with an...

    Zumiez (ZUMZ +2.5%) trades higher this morning after Credit Suisse initiates the shares with an outperform, saying it is one of the "few truly differentiated retailers in the mall."
     
     
     
     
    | 11:22 AM
  • DRIV-OLD

    Shares of Digital River (DRIV-OLD +6.5%) move higher after the company announced a $100M share...

    Shares of Digital River (DRIV-OLD +6.5%) move higher after the company announced a $100M share buyback plan. The repurchasement commitment represents close to 14% of the stock's market cap at today's opening price.

     
     
     
     
    | 11:16 AM
  • SEH

    Spartech (SEH +23.7%) soars after its FQ3 beat estimates as the packaging company was able to...

    Spartech (SEH +23.7%) soars after its FQ3 beat estimates as the packaging company was able to offset a decline in volume by raising prices and selling a higher-priced mix of products. The company raises the lower end of its FY12 EPS estimates, now seeing $0.18 to $0.20 per share.

     
     
     
     
    | 11:15 AM
  • WDC

    SanDisk (SNDK +6%) leads gainers among chip stocks (SOXX +1.8%) after Avian upgrades shares to...

    SanDisk (SNDK +6%) leads gainers among chip stocks (SOXX +1.8%) after Avian upgrades shares to Positive from Negative, expecting forward subduing price declines as new production is pushed into 2012. Avian notes Samsung and Hynix are reducing wafer starts and expects "product coming offline to rationalize pricing." Also: MU +8.1%, MRVL +2.4%, ALTR +2.2%.

     
     
     
     
    | 11:13 AM
  • SRPT

    AVI BioPharma (AVII) jumps +12% after Lazard initiates coverage with a buy, citing the strength...

    AVI BioPharma (AVII) jumps +12% after Lazard initiates coverage with a buy, citing the strength of its pipeline.
     
     
     
     
    | 10:56 AM
  • CB

    Commercial insurer Ace Ltd. (ACE -0.1%) buys Penn Millers Holding (PMIC +23.4%) for $107M in...

    Commercial insurer Ace Ltd. (ACE -0.1%) buys Penn Millers Holding (PMIC +23.4%) for $107M in cash, in an effort to expand its presence in the U.S. agribusiness market.

     
     
     
     
    | 10:45 AM
  • DG

    Dollar General (DG -4.2%) drops as an SEC file reveals that company executives and a holding...

    Dollar General (DG -4.2%) drops as an SEC file reveals that company executives and a holding company affiliated with some of its directors intend to sell 25M shares, with none of the proceeds going to Dollar General itself.

     
     
     
     
    | 10:34 AM
  • MEIP

    Marshall Edwards (MSHL +25%) pops after saying it's initiating phase I clinical trials of its...

    Marshall Edwards (MSHL +25%) pops after saying it's initiating phase I clinical trials of its lead drug candidate ME-143 for patients with refractory solid tumors.

     
     
     
     
    | 10:33 AM
  • AAL

    Airline stocks (FAA -0.5%) falter today with the usual suspect - high fuel prices - being blamed...

    Airline stocks (FAA -0.5%) falter today with the usual suspect - high fuel prices - being blamed (yet again) by analysts for the decline. Bucking the trend is US Airways (LCC +1.4%), posting a tidy gain after saying its ChoiceSeats revenue could jump higher.

     
     
     
     
    | 10:25 AM
  • TLRD

    Suit retailer The Men's Warehouse (MW) is down 6.7% after reporting FQ2 revenue of $655.5M (+22%...

    Suit retailer The Men's Warehouse (MW) is down 6.7% after reporting FQ2 revenue of $655.5M (+22% Y/Y) and EPS of $1.11, beating consensus by $11.9M and $0.07. Comparable store sales increased for each of the company's 4 brands. FQ3 EPS is expected to be in a range of $0.62-$0.64, the midpoint of which is below a $0.64 consensus. (PR)

     
     
     
     
    | 10:14 AM
  • TITN

    Shares of Titan Machinery (TITN -9.2%) sink even after the firm reports a strong increase in Q2...

    Shares of Titan Machinery (TITN -9.2%) sink even after the firm reports a strong increase in Q2 earnings and revenue, as well as raising its full-year revenue guidance to $1.33B-$1.405B, from $1.31B-$1.39B. Analysts had called for slightly higher revenue of $1.41B, possibly accounting for today's sharp selloff - but looking a bit harsh.

     
     
     
     
    | 10:04 AM | 2 Comments
  • CSCO

    Cisco (CSCO +1.5%) is catching a bid as Auriga's Sandeep Shyamsukha upgrades shares to Buy, and...

    Cisco (CSCO +1.5%) is catching a bid as Auriga's Sandeep Shyamsukha upgrades shares to Buy, and lifts his PT to $20. Shyamsukha expects Cisco to take market share from H-P (NYSE:HPQ) and Juniper (NYSE:JNPR) over the next 12 months, thanks to new switching and routing products, and turmoil at H-P. (previously)

     
     
     
     
    | 10:04 AM
  • CALP

    Premarket gainers: CALP +41%. HOV +4%. PAY +3%.Losers: DNDN -5%. NBG -4%. ACH -4%. SI -3%. MTG...

    Premarket gainers: CALP +41%. HOV +4%. PAY +3%.
    Losers: DNDN -5%. NBG -4%. ACH -4%. SI -3%. MTG -3%. TS -3%.

     
     
     
     
    | 9:00 AM
  • PAY

    Shares of VeriFone (NYSE:PAY) are up 3% after S&P announces the company will be added to the...

    Shares of VeriFone (NYSE:PAY) are up 3% after S&P announces the company will be added to the S&P MidCap 400 index replacing Timberland (NYSE:TBL).

     
     
     
     
    | 8:53 AM
  • TZOO

    Morgan Keegan downgrades Travelzoo (NASDAQ:TZOO) to Market Perform from Outperform. Yesterday,...

    Morgan Keegan downgrades Travelzoo (NASDAQ:TZOO) to Market Perform from Outperform. Yesterday, Travelzoo reported a "seasonal slowdown" in its Local Deals, as revenue for July and August came in at $10.8M and $9.9M respectively. Shares -4% premarket.

     
     
     
     
    | 8:47 AM
  • CASY

    Casey's General Stores (NASDAQ:CASY) misses earnings estimates by $0.02 on in-line revenue of...

    Casey's General Stores (NASDAQ:CASY) misses earnings estimates by $0.02 on in-line revenue of $1.87B for FY12 Q1. The firm's profit margin fell to 14.2% from 17.2% after higher prices on fuel, coffee and cheese kicked in. Operating expenses rose 17.3% after adjusting for the prior year's expenses associated with a hostile takeover. Shares -4.1% premarket.

     
     
     
     
    | 8:38 AM
